item.title: 2018 pictures
item.description: Some pictures of different activities during this year 2018 A group of us from Scallable Cooperation group at MediaLab visited Riyad, Abu Dhabi and Dubai to talk about Future of Work. Complenet happenned in Boston this year. Here I am talking about how do you met your best friend? I was an invited speaker at NERCCS 2018 conference to talk about our work on the dynamics of strong ties A bunch of network scientist close to the Netsci 2018 venue
